runOnSave.commands.command: npm run pre-deploy && rm -rf ../dist && cp -r dist .. && rm -rf ../ReactGrid-Pro/node_modules/@silevis && cd ../ReactGrid-Pro && npm i ./../dist --force --save-dev && npm i react react-dom --no-save && npm run copy:mit:tests && npm run copy:styles && npm run copy:reactgrid:TestGrid && cd ../reactgrid
